segments.text: Oh my goodness, this is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That poor woman is going to slip and fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, they're going to tip that stool right over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm so scared just watching them, I can't even imagine what could happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to look away, but I can't help but stare at the scene unfolding before me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a slow-motion car crash, and there's nothing I can do to stop it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm terrified for their safety, and I don't even know them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they realize what they're doing before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't take my eyes off them, even though I want to.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm going to be relieved when this is all over and everyone is safe.
segments.speaker: PAR
